profile.name: Subkhan Ibnu Aji
profile.title: S.Kom., M.B.A.
profile.tagline: Government Tech Leader ‚Ä¢ AI Researcher ‚Ä¢ Crypto Enthusiast
profile.bio: Cross-functional professional with expertise in Digital Transformation, IT Governance, AI/ML, Blockchain/Web3, and Cybersecurity. Currently serving at Indonesia's Ministry of Housing and Settlement Areas (Kementerian PKP), handling enterprise IT projects including SIBARU, PKP HUB, and SIMONI systems.

projects.name: HUB PKP
projects.subtitle: Digital Housing Ecosystem
projects.description: Comprehensive digital platform for Indonesia's self-built housing program under Ministry PKP. Features include AI-powered design consultation, integrated permit processing, material marketplace, certified worker facilitation, housing finance integration, and construction monitoring.
projects.long_description: HUB PKP is the flagship digital platform I developed to transform Indonesia's self-built housing ecosystem. It addresses the gap between housing stakeholders and citizens who need affordable access to quality housing. The platform integrates multiple services: design consultation (prototype and custom), SIMBG permit integration, verified material suppliers, certified construction workers, banking partnerships for financing, and real-time construction monitoring.
projects.impact: Streamlines housing construction process for 84% of Indonesian homes built through self-construction (swadaya)
